mapper.insert: insert into tb_planner values (#{plan_seq}, #{mem_seq}, #{plan_title},#{plan_content},#{plan_background},TO_DATE(Translate(SUBSTR (#{plan_start},1,19),'T',' ') ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(Translate(SUBSTR (#{plan_end},1,19),'T',' '),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: update tb_planner set plan_title = #{plan_title}, plan_background = #{plan_background},plan_start = TO_DATE(#{plan_start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ,plan_end = TO_DATE(#{plan_end},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),plan_content=#{plan_content} where plan_seq = #{plan_seq}
